about.title: About me
about.greeting: Technical Professional | Frontend Developer | Web Developer
about.description1: I'm a developer passionate about technology and web design. I specialize in creating dynamic and optimized interfaces, delivering smooth and engaging user experiences.
about.description2: Although my strength is frontend development, I also have knowledge of backend and databases, allowing me to build more complete and scalable solutions.
about.description3: I'm always exploring new technologies, refining my code, and finding innovative ways to create better projects.
about.description4: I’m driven by new challenges and opportunities to keep growing in the world of web development.

timeline.descripcion: Web Developer with experience in theme customization on WordPress, responsive design, and integration of visual elements (CSS, HTML).
Graduated with specialization in web development.
Specialized course in Angular, RxJS, and best practices.
Cloud Computing Course Certificate: AWS - Azure - Google Cloud.
